Uses of Package
jmines.view.components

Packages that use jmines.view.components
jmines.control.actions This package contains all the action objects used to construct the menus of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.board This package contains all the action objects used to construct the board menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.displayandsounds This package contains all the action objects used to construct the display menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.game This package contains all the action objects used to construct the game menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.info This package contains all the action objects used to construct the info menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.language This package contains all the action objects used to construct the language menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.other This package contains all the action objects used to construct the other menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.robot This package contains all the action objects used to construct the robot menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.listeners This package contains all the objects used to listen the user events on the main and game panels. 
jmines.persistence This package contains all the persistence classes : to save and load user configuration. 
jmines.view This package contains all the Human Machine Interface classes : to display frames and panels and to play sounds. 
jmines.view.components This package contains all the panels classes : the game panel, the LCD panels, the top panel (containing LCD and smiley button) and the main panel containing the previous panels. 
jmines.view.dialogs This package contains all the dialogs classes : to display JMines information, to display best times, to create a custom game and to enter user name. 
 

Classes in jmines.view.components used by jmines.control.actions
MainFrame
          The class entry point of JMines applications.
MainPanel
          This is the JMines main panel, it contains a top panel with the two LCDs (for the number of flag and the time) the game panel and a status bar at the bottom.

Classes in jmines.view.components used by jmines.view.components
CheatPixel
          This dialog object represent the upper left pixel indicating the content of a cell when the wheat code has been typed.
GamePanel
          The panel in which the game is drawn and the mouse events listened.
LCDPanel
          An LCD like panel that can only display integer numbers.
MainFrame
          The class entry point of JMines applications.
MainPanel
          This is the JMines main panel, it contains a top panel with the two LCDs (for the number of flag and the time) the game panel and a status bar at the bottom.
MenuBar
          The menu bar of the application.
TopPanel
          The top panel is the panel containing the time and flags LCD panels and the start button.
